item.title: phyloraster: Evolutionary Diversity Metrics for Raster Data
item.description: Phylogenetic indices (such as phylogenetic diversity (Faith 1992), phylogenetic endemism (Rosauer et al. 2009), and weighted endemism (Laffan et al., 2016)) for presence-absence rasters.

item.title: SESraster: Raster Randomization for Null Hypothesis Testing
item.description: Randomization of presence/absence species distribution raster data for calculating standardized effect sizes and testing null hypothesis. The randomization algorithms are based on classical algorithms for matrices (Gotelli 2000, doi:10.2307/177478) implemented for raster data.
